memberdef.name: SwaptionVolatilityMatrix

briefdescription.para: fixed reference date and fixed market data, option dates

detaileddescription.para: This class provides the at-the-money volatility for a given swaption by interpolating a volatility matrix whose elements are the market volatilities of a set of swaption with given option date and swapLength.
